benchmark_details.name: ASH (Authenticity, Sensitivity, Harmony)
benchmark_details.overview: The ASH benchmark evaluates LLMsâ€™ culinary creativity in the cuisine transfer task by assessing the cultural accuracy and creativity of generated recipes.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess LLMs' abilities in generating culturally adapted recipes through the cuisine transfer task.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The evaluation may not comprehensively represent all perspectives within culinary domains.

data.source: Created standardized cuisine transfer instructions based on various cuisines and dishes.
data.annotation: Rated by LLM evaluators and human annotators for authenticity, sensitivity, and harmony.

methodology.calculation: Average ratings calculated for each criterion across all generated recipes.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better adherence to the criteria of authenticity, sensitivity, and overall recipe quality.
methodology.validation: Evaluators' agreement scores calculated to assess evaluation consistency.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Implemented evaluation criteria to prioritize authenticity and sensitivity.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Participants in evaluations provided consent to participate.
